headline: Biotech Stocks Are Up. The Sector Is Looking Better Than It Has in Years.
summary: The  SPDR S&P Biotech  exchange-traded fund, which tracks a broad selection of biotech names, has shot up 8.9% since September 25, just more than a week ago.  The biotech run-up over the past week or so has been fueled by the same drug-pricing deal between  Pfizer  and President Donald Trump that set off a surge in Big Pharma share prices last Tuesday, along with a spate of acquisitions.  “Investors are naturally jittery, since prior rallies haven’t been sustained,” Cantor Fitzgerald analysts Josh Schimmer and Eric Schmidt wrote in a note on Friday.

headline: My Top 5 Biotech Stocks Big Pharma Could Buy Next
summary: Many of the biotech stocks remain outside of Mr. Market's interest zone. Check out five biotech firms that may be of interest to Big Pharma players.

headline: Investing Smart: Bristol-Myers Squibb (BMY) Among the Best Affordable Dividend Stocks
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is included among the 11 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is an American pharmaceutical giant that operates in multiple countries and is based in New Jersey.
